mapper.insert: INSERT into music(music_id, music_name, thumbnail) VALUES( #{music_id}, #{music_name}, #{description}, #{thumbnail} )
INSERT into mbti_result(mbti, EI, NS, TF, JP, time) VALUES( #{mbti}, #{EI}, #{NS}, #{TF}, #{JP}, #{time} )
INSERT INTO mbti_music_great(music_id, session_id, mbti_name) VALUES( #{music_id}, #{session_id}, #{mbti_name} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.music_id, m.music_name, m.album, m.artist, m.thumbnail, count(mmg.mbti_music_great_id) as great_count FROM music m, mbti_music_great mmg WHERE m.music_id = mmg.music_id AND mmg.mbti_name = #{mbti_name} GROUP BY m.music_id
